article.title: Status and history for [skr]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: replaced all the occurrences of <U+06D4 ۔ ARABIC FULL STOP, U+0020 ‘ ’ SPACE, U+06D4 ۔ ARABIC FULL STOP> by a single U+06D4. Removed the extra "1." and "2." in the second article.
replaced all the occurrences of U+066C ٬ ARABIC THOUSANDS SEPARATOR by U+060C ، ARABIC COMMA.
stage 4: full version provided by Kumari Co Ltd. via the Language Observatory.
stage 2: entered in the index, OHCHR identified as the source.
